Title: Prohibits the legislature from recessing after the start of the state fiscal year until it has passed a budget
Summary: Prohibits the legislature from recessing after the start of the state fiscal year until it has passed a budget; allows recess during such period for public holidays.
LawCode: Amd ยง5, add ยง53-a, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to prohibiting the legislature from recessing after the commencement of the state fiscal year until it has enacted a budget for such year
